Wrath: I guess. I haven't looked in a little bit. Who is this? *Wrath said =
pointing at Infectra* Infectra: I'm Infectra. You? *Infectra held her hand =
out for a hand shake* *Wrath raised an eye brow* Wrath: I'm Wrath. *Wrath s=
ays turning away from Infectra and exiting the base* *Infectra frowns*
  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Friday, July 07, 2000 4:27 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Hello,=
 Wrath, nice eather we're having, huh?" Stranato said, smiling at Wrath, tr=
ying to be nice even though he really wanted to insult him...
    ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

    Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 4:07 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
    *Infectra nodded and looked around not really knowing who to choose*

 =
   *Then Wrath steps out of the CR Chamber and see's The Radicons with Infe=
ctra and walks up to them*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: =
THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 3:=
26 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      "Whomever seems friendliest=
." Airbomber replied to Infectra...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
       From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent:=
 Thursday, July 06, 2000 9:01 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    =
    Infectra: Okay, umm....which one??? *Infectra says to Airbomber*
      =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 7:56 PM
         =
 Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "Well, you shall be amazed at how =
much Liono screwed up the future, but you should go and get aquainted with =
some of the other bots." Airbomber said to Infectra...
            ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:43 PM
       =
     Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *Infectra nodded and looked =
around* Infectra: What should I expect to happen or find out here? *Infectr=
a says to The Radicons*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
       From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              S=
ent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:49 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast W=
ars


              "Give them a chance, I'm sure they'll like you." Airbom=
ber whispered back to Infectra...
                ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
            =
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *Infectra smiles waves to=
 any bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't think they like me. *Infectra=
 whispers to Airbomber*
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
               From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
               Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
                  Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbom=
ber said, making sure nobody was aiming their blaster's at Infectra.

     =
             "Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She's with us!" Airbomber sa=
id. Plintissa growled.

                  "These Radicons fired at me, Arti=
st, and Dracona when we tried to help them and ran away! I don't think they=
 could be trusted!" Plintissa said.

                  "We have our gestalt=
 form and we're useful and powerful." Stranato said. Plintissa walked away =
angrily...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
      From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
                  Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
                    =
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    *Infectra nods and follow=
s the Radicons* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted? *In=
fectra says to the Radicons*
                      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
                      From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
  =
                    Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                      Sinesis=
 and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when the othe=
r looked. They both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each other,=
 but they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

              =
        Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they walked off =
to the Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

                      "Hey,=
 have any of you seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plintissa asked. Dr=
acona started to look around in logical places a lunatic might hide.

     =
                 Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around and drinking=
 tea and they left again.

                      "Who shall we join with, d=
ear?" Inzola asked.

                      "Whomever wants out assistance."=
 Deemos replies. They walk on until they see the Alliance base.

          =
            "This one looks good, lets go and ask them if they have any nee=
d for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walked up to the base.

         =
             "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to join your fine team, we=
 have been looking for a faction to join, and it appears that it is you who=
 will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join you, what fo we =
have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, please, no killin=
g a bot things or anything.)

                      Gangon had a nightmare,=
 He was again tied to the magical chair when Sinister and Sinesis came up t=
o him. Then BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pulled of their mas=
ks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other head Deemos. Gangon sc=
reamed and held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and remembered that he c=
ouldn't move. He considered that thing about getting a replacement body, ho=
w it would be a good idea just in case he had to get out of this dump, whic=
h was probable if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for Plintissa and Dr=
acona to come back.

                      The Radicons looked at Infectra.=


                      "Now, all you need to do is follow us, we have set =
you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as how you =
would make a great addition to their group." Airbomber said. They walked in=
side of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to follow.

                =
      Artist walked around the war room in circles, not quite knowing where=
 he was going.



---------------------------------------------------------=
